name: Flame Swordsman, Sunsmith
text:
2+ Flame Sword monster(s), or "Flame Manipulator" + "Masaki the Legendary Swordsman"
If this card is Fusion Summoned: Special Summon 1 "Flame Swordsman" from your Extra Deck. All "Flame Sword" monsters you control gain 1800 ATK. Monsters equipped with "Salamandra" can attack twice per Battle Phase.
